title: Bikerumor Editor’s Choice Awards 2021 – Tyler’s Best Bikes & Gear Picks
content:
Every year I test way more bikes, components, kits, and other gear than I have time to fully write about. So, you’ll see mention here of products that I’ve been testing for anywhere from a few weeks to almost a year, and it might be the first time you’ve seen them mentioned. Because I’m way

The post Bikerumor Editor’s Choice Awards 2021 – Tyler’s Best Bikes & Gear Picks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
